Paragraph: It was also reported that angular - fused NDT has a lower - lying HOMO energy level than that of linearfused NDT , which could be beneficial for better air stability and greater open - circuit voltage ( V oc ) for polymer solar cells ( PSCs ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Angular-fused NDT |
| Linear-fused NDT |
| Polymer solar cells (PSCs) |

The entities "polymer solar cells (PSCs)" and "air" are not clearly referring to material names, so they have been removed from the table.
